title: Chicken and mangetout stir fry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', 'salt and pepper to taste', '900g bone-in chicken pieces, such as legs, thighs and wings', '1 tomato, diced', '1 carrot, sliced', '2 sticks celery, sliced', '450g fresh mangetout, trimmed', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1 teaspoon water']
